meanings.definition: A female member of a royal or noble family who holds the title of electress.
meanings.sent1: The electresses attended the royal ball in elegant gowns.
meanings.sent2: The electresses greeted the visiting dignitaries with grace and poise.
meanings.sent3: The electresses decided to have a race to determine who was the fastest in the kingdom.
meanings.sent4: In the land of books, the electresses were the queens of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The electresses' presence in the court was as bright as the morning sun.

meanings.sent1: The electresses prepared a grand feast to celebrate their husband's victory.
meanings.sent2: The electresses supported their husbands in all political matters.
meanings.sent3: The electresses joked that being married to an elector meant endless debates at dinner.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of love, the electresses were the queens of their electors' hearts.
meanings.sent5: The electresses' loyalty to their electors was unwavering and true.

meanings.definition: A woman who has been elected to a position of power or authority.
meanings.sent1: The electresses led the council with wisdom and fairness.
meanings.sent2: The electresses campaigned tirelessly to win the election for mayor.
meanings.sent3: The electresses decided to settle disputes with a dance-off instead of arguments.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of politics, the electresses were the undisputed rulers of diplomacy.
meanings.sent5: The electresses' speeches inspired hope and unity among the people.
